title: Spam Email Detection using SMOTE and Simple Neural Network
body: Hi everyone, in this article I will share you how to create your own machine learning (ML) to predict email is spam or not using SMOTE and Simple Neural Network (NN).

title: Supermarket Sales (Dashboard Looker Studio)
body: This Dashboard display an visualizations of dataset obtained from open-source platform, Kaggle. The data is Supermarket Sales uploaded by aungpyaeap. For more information about this dataset, please visit the url at https://www.kaggle.com/aungpyaeap/supermarket-sales.

title: Customer Personality (Dashboard Looker Studio)
body: I Create Dashboard from Customer Personality in Company X, there are dashboard and models tabs. Dataset that I use from the results of cleaning and selecting variables, before labeling and clustering results. (My post 'Customer Personality Analysis')

title: Predict the Success of Bank Telemarketing
body: The data is related with direct marketing campaigns (phone calls) of a Portuguese banking institution. The classification goal is to predict if the client will subscribe a term deposit (variable y). Dataset from https://www.kaggle.com/alexkataev/bank-marketing-data-set.

title: Customer Personality Analysis
body: Need to perform clustering to summarize customer segments. Dataset from https://www.kaggle.com/imakash3011/customer-personality-analysis.

title: Project Data Analysis for B2B Retail: Customer Analytics Report
body: (SQL) Analysis of the company's condition in the last month to be presented at the townhall (2004).

title: Project Data Analysis for Retail: Sales Performance Report
body: Analyze the performance of the DQLab Store using MySQL.

title: Project Machine Learning with Python: Building Recommender System
body: Creating a recommendation system using Python, the data we will use here is a movie database from imdb complete with metadata.

title: Determination of National Pure Premium for Property Insurance (OJK Project)
body: Filter property insurance claims data in indonesia from 2015 to 2019 for each occupational code. Then the rate for each occupational code is determined to limit the national insurance premium for each occupational code.

title: Data Analyst Project: Business Decision Research
body: Data preparation (ETL data), Visualization, Basic Stat Method (modeling) using DQLab sport center data for 2013 - 2019.
